name: Ninja Harvest
description:
When a ninja hits something in mid air he can get an air jump.

Controls:

  • attack: M, J, Y keys or mouse left click
  • jump: Space, Up arrow or mouse right click

Known Issues:

There are some glitches showing blue pixels on some platform corners. We are working to fix that. Sorry.

Credits:

art/UI/animation: https://joyscifer.itch.io/
programming/game design: https://ckoshiro.itch.io/
